Learn the basics of lambeq and compositional models of meaning.

lambeq pipeline

Tutorials

Jump into hands-on tutorials to learn how to put lambeq to work.

Convert sentences into circuits

Get familiar with lambeq's stages such as diagram creation, rewriting and parameterisation.

Training models

Learn how to use the provided state-of-the-art trainers to train your models for language processing tasks.

Advanced

Take a look at lambeq's internals and start mastering low-level aspects of the toolkit.

Low-level lambeq

Delve into the mathematics and see how string diagrams fit to monoidal categories theory.

Extending lambeq

Learn how to take advantage of the extensible nature of lambeq and how to add new features tailored to you work.
